website_summaries.verdict: This option from Graco is a great lightweight way to turn your infant seat into a stroller.
pros: Takes up very little room for storage
Easy to leave in the back of your car or van until you need it
Includes cup holders and built in storage
cons: This stroller does not grow with baby after he or she grows out of an infant seat

customer_reviews.title: Best invention for an avid shopper
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have. I have the Graco FastAction Fold Jogger Click Connect Travel System, which I think Is the most fabolous stroller ever. However, the stroller took up the entire back of my truck, which made it hard to shop, so I stumbled upon this little gem. It's super lightweight, easy to open and close, very easy to maneuver, and very compact. I know it's a little crazy to have multiple strollers , but believe me, this is a must have in addition to your travel system..
customer_reviews.author: Larraya Bynum

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight stroller for casual outings!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this lightweight stroller for casual walks and shopping! Fits perfectly with our Graco Click Connect 30. PROS: Very lightweight, folds easily, fits in the back of our Jeep Cherokee with room to spare, steers nicely, large basket underneath for diaper bag/groceries/whatever. CONS: Wheels are kind of plasticky so they're a little on the bumpy/noisy side when not on perfectly smooth ground, no little compartment between the cup holders (the Snap n' Go stroller has one), every so often the folding mechanism catches. Overall, for the price, I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: ADC_10

customer_reviews.title: This is a good grab.
customer_reviews.text: I love this frame. It’s easy to maneuver, lightweight and I would recommend this to everyone. It feels so smooth in your hands like you are pushing nothing. Doesn’t need To much force to get it moving. Love it. New moms you should definitely buy.
customer_reviews.author: Adma Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble. Love the cup holders. Fits my graco car seat like a glove. Very smooth stroller. Easy to fold up. Not too heavy for me. Will make getting baby in and out of the car easy. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TriSaraht0ps

customer_reviews.title: Nice stroller frame for use with car seat/baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go with our car seat/baby carrier. The carrier snaps right in to the stroller. Stroller is a nice size—much sleeker than I expected in a food way as I did not want a huge bulky contraption. Cup holders up top and storage underneath carrier. Folds up easily and isn’t terribly heavy (I can lift myself). One downside—I wish the sun cover went down a little more as the sun does enter the searing area depending on its angle (an issue in summer months when I began using this).
customer_reviews.author: cke

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to fold/unfold
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my larger, heavier stroller and it was definitely a great purchase. I have to take my newborn out twice a week to run my toddler into school, so it's a quick thing. This stroller is so much more convenient and lightweight for quick in and out trips. It unfolds and folds by pressing a button and squeezing the handle. Super easy and a great purchase. The one con I noticed is that since it's so lightweight, when I put my backpack diaper bag on the handle, I thought it may tip. I just ended up wearing the bag... No big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: MAKES LIFE EASIER!
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this with my 3rd baby, I knew I needed something small and easy to use while out and about with family. This was such a life saver during the newborn/infant stage. Seriously life changing, lol I wish I wouldve used it on all my kids! It folds up and down EASY. It's very light, fits with the connect graco car seats, I'm really sad that we're going to be growing out of it here shortly I wish I could use it longer than the infant carseat stage. I recommend to everyone I know who has a newborn or is pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Mammabee

customer_reviews.title: perhaps snap n go's products are better 8 years later as well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old snap n go. perhaps snap n go's products are better 8 years later as well, but this is by far a much smoother ride than my last. my one disappointment is that after using this product for 3 months, I sometimes have a difficult time collapsing it.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia g

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoors
customer_reviews.text: We have a jogging stroller that I love but it’s very big and bulky. I wanted a smaller stroller that I could take to restaurants and other indoor places where space is tight, this is perfect. The footprint is very small, it’s easy to maneuver, it folds up very small and easily, and is so light for me to get in and out of my car. I wish the cup holders were deeper but that’s a #firstworldproblem.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a travel stroller because of the way it collapsed, it’s size and weight for a plane. Man did it deliver. It made it through the beaches of Maui, all over California and now I prefer it over my normal stroller. Very durable, it’s been checked in on multiple flights without a scratch. Pros: It’s one click pops or shuts with one hand. There is a secret pocket on the inside for your phone/keys/etc. The car seat pops right on, forward or backward in seconds. No identifying the right piece and missing. Two cup holders The handle bar can be Locked in three separate positions. No cons.
customer_reviews.author: HMH^2 HLH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 10 stars if I could! I'm not one of those supermoms that can hike 10 miles with a carseat. I can't make it 15 feet without getting flushed. This is the best baby item I spent money on! My Graco carseat clicks safely in the carrier and off we go! Shopping was a breeze with this thing, and I love that I can see my baby and he can see me! Harder for strangers to come touch your baby 😗🚫 lol
customer_reviews.author: Princess Leah

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to manouver, one handed!
customer_reviews.text: The only improvement Craco should consider is to make this stroller base forward AND backward facing. The wind/sun always hits the car-seat full force front on, in the babies face. (Murphy's law) I love this stroller base. My daughter has 2, each car has a click-base and a stroller base. When they come to visit me I also have the stroller base so they don't have to bring theirs, it frees up precious trunk space, although this one is compact. Some cars aren't that big.
customer_reviews.author: L. W.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to let baby keep sleeping in the car seat, yet not have to carry the car seat myself and break my back. I still have yet to figure out the trick in lining the car seat up with this stroller just right the first time, so it takes me a few seconds to get it to click in. Occasionally its gotten stuck in unfolding, so I’m really hoping it won’t break over time. Other than that though, it’s easy to fold and unfold when using my foot on the bottom basket, too. It’s long when folded, but not wide, if that makes sense. Not heavy either. Adding a photo of it in my Sienna trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Cutie 3.14

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces and errands!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative for if you have a larger stroller and want a smaller one for tight spaces (Doctors Offices, Restaurants, etc). I got the Graco SnugRider car seat along with a jogger stroller and I love the jogger stroller when doing outdoor things but this stroller is nice when we go to dinner with family or I go to doctors appointments because it's easier to maneuver. It's light weight and easy to fold. My car seat snaps in super easy and the pricing is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Frushon

customer_reviews.title: Plastic part of wheel broke, baby fell
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on a visit overseas& the front wheel broke off first few weeks of use! Baby tipped over, but is ok. Had to leave it behind& called Amazon cus service to ask for refund& they did! Thank u “Kevin” (customer service operator) So happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Fo

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: The one time that I desperately needed to use this stroller I couldn’t get it to open. I have 5 kids and I’ve had more strollers than I can count. This is the only one I couldn’t figure out how to open. It’s stupid. I shouldn’t have to read a manual just to open a stroller. Now in the product video they made sure to show you how to close it. That’s the easy part! Edit: I didn’t get to use this stroller not one time. The button to open it got jammed somehow. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: ThighQueen

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly convenient! No more waking up the baby to transfer the baby from the car seat to the stroller. This was purchased after we saw the hospital using the same stroller base to help discharge babies! We also purchased an extra car seat base for the second car. Talk about easy! It really is snap and go! Easy to fold and gets you around just fine! I love that the baby is protected in their car seat and facing you. Perfect gift for the new mom or dad!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we were going on a trip with our 2 month old. It was so easy to use. It survived 10 plane rides where we gate checked it so I know it's durable. It was easy to use to get around. We have a Graco SnugRide 30 LX which clicked right on to the frame for quick set up. Comes off just as easy as taking the car seat off the base. It wasn't as easy to fold as I thought it would be. Like I couldn't do it one handed but it was still really easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Andie N.

customer_reviews.title: Evenflo LiteMax 35 can use this frame stroller
customer_reviews.text: I like this car seat frame stroller very much! The most amazing thing is it can hold the car seat of other brand like Evenflo. I have a Evenflo LiteMax 35 carseat which can latch on this frame quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, compact
customer_reviews.text: I drive a subaru impreza and I wanted another stroller for quick walks and something portable for quick errands. It's lightweight, easy to assemble (about 5-10 min) and folds very easily. I use my click connect carseat and it's exactly what I expected. I'm currently using this compact stroller more than than my full size stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swallow your pride, this is worth it
customer_reviews.text: This stroller frame is exactly what I was looking for. We currently have the Snugride Snuglock 35 car seat and it really does just snap into the frame. It’s easy to assemble (again, just snapping things into place— cup holder, wheels, & bar to steady the undercarriage), easy to fold, SUPER lightweight, and easy to maneuver. I was skeptical at first, but after assembling and rolling it around, it’s fantastic. I highly recommend this product if you are like me and thought you could manage by just carrying the car seat. Just save yourself some pride and buy this product. It will make baby transport WAY more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can not fit a diaper bag underneath
customer_reviews.text: The handle that releases the lock to fold the stroller is tricky and has to be played with to work. It jams really easily. YOU CAN NOT FIT A DIAPER BAG UNDERNEATH, WHAT IS THE POINT????? Stay away. If the release wasn't so cheap and the bottom had better storage and accessibility, I would give a much better review. Unfortunately wasn't thinking about the diaper bag and didn't realize how cheap the release handle was in the store. Now looking for different system.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! It’s lightweight and easy to maneuver! I had originally chosen the Baby Trend Snap & Go baby car seat carrier on my baby registry list, but once someone purchased it and sent it to us, I didn’t like it. It wouldn’t snap and I felt it wasn’t secure for the car seat. For reference I have the Graco 35 LX Snugride car seat. I returned the Baby Trend one and bought this once instead. Huge difference! It clicked and locked the car seat securely and safely! Love it!! Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Celi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stroller
customer_reviews.text: The baby isn't due for another few weeks but wow...I love this stroller already. I'm a huge babywearing fan, I basically never used a stroller with my first daughter, but the daughter that's due in a few weeks has a complex congenital heart defect and will need to be bundled up and secure in her car seat when we go to her million doctors appointments. This is the perfect stroller for that. Compact, portable, lightweight, and just perfect for our Graco carseat. Absolutely already impressed. I will update the review if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth on purchasing this stroller. I received a jogging stroller and thought that would be enough. I continued to look at this stroller for months while pregnant and the reviews were so positive and ease of use. I am so glad I did! 4 weeks post birth; I use this stroller all the time. Easy to fold out, light weight and a large compartment on the bottom. The only negative is the button can stick when closing it...we found if we pull it towards us first then it works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller for traveling because I didn't want the airport baggage handlers to smash my more expensive stroller. I'm so glad I made this purchase. I almost like this stroller more than my expensive one because it is so light and I can open and close it with one hand. The basket at the bottom doesn't hold too much and is hard to access when the car seat is in place. I feel like my baby is secure when the car seat is snapped in. The ride is very smooth and it turns on a dime. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: M Anon

customer_reviews.title: Skipped the travel system
customer_reviews.text: Update: I've folded this up about ten times now and the handle to release/close sticks so bad it doesn't work. I'd buy a different brand. The Graco SnugRide SnugLock 35 Elite Infant Car Seat, Spencer fits perfect and it took us a total of 5 minutes to assemble. This will make it so much easier than lifting a big bulky travel system stroller out of my trunk. This also allowed me to purchase the Elite car seat instead of settling with the standard model that came with the travel system. Impressed with Graco so far!
customer_reviews.author: arCtiC

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint with this stroller is that it is extremely difficult to collapse when you push the trigger. I finally gave up it since I have a minivan so I just put the stroller in the truck and do not collapse it at all. I am not sure if you have to have t he wheels lined up in a special way??? It was terrible at the airport when you have to juggle a baby in one arm and try to collapse it with the other arm and have a ton of people waiting in line behind you at the gate check.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Durable and useful!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this stroller for more than 6 months now, and we've put over 200 miles on it, most of those with the baby snoozing away inside. We don't have a fancy shaded carseat, but I found that a claw-style hairclip and a muslin blanket can easy be positioned and repositioned to protect him from the sun in his eyes. Though we have 2 other strollers, this one was really the most useful the first 6-8 months of our baby's life.
customer_reviews.author: Linseaweed

customer_reviews.title: Although I had to return this due to no fault of the item.....
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use with Graco infant seats but it did not fit the ones I use, unfortunately. It was easy to assemble, and disassemble and very sturdy and easy to maneuver. I sure wish I could have gotten one to fit my older Graco seat. Would definitely recommend though because of quality and ease of assembly. Seller graciously refunded, no questions asked. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: RMAC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for newborns!!
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot describe how much I absolutely love this contraption!!! I saw a mom at my son's school use one for her baby and thought I'd try it out. The price is very reasonable. Now I bring it everywhere baby and I go. It is wonderfully maneuverable and it's a champion at going over curbs and sidewalk bumps. I can assemble it one-handed, it's nice and leightweight, but with a decent center of gravity so I can hang my purse in it without being afraid of it tipping and the little cubby thing in the bottom holds a diaper bag nicely. This is hands down my favorite must-have baby item right now!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought the universal snap and go not realizing graco made their own simple stroller for the infant car seat. I returned the snap and go because it didn’t seem safe and wasn’t all that amazing. I then stumbled on this stroller and I’m so happy I found it and bought it. We opened it and put it together today. It looks like a quality stroller. It appears durable! Easy fold button. Car seat snaps right in. The handle is adjustable for various preferences based on users height. Long story short. If this is compatible with ur car seat, I would definitely purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Found it on sale at Amazon cheaper than anywhere else! I was scared it would be hard to fold and unfold after reading some of the reviews... but took a chance because I really needed it. Let me say- I have had ZERO issues with how it works and I am 5'3 and 110 pounds. I can easily work this and it operates beautifully. I wish it were as cheap as the other brand foldable carseat stroller - but still money well spent in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set up and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my Graco SnugRide Click Connect 35 since I am constantly going in and out of the car and I don't want to wake up the baby to place them in a carrier. It was easy to set up and light weight. The basket is big enough if I use this as a regular stroller and I am doing a little local shopping. I took away one star because I am always having issues with the open / close push and release button which can be annoying at times. Otherwise this is a wonderful stroller and easy to push.
customer_reviews.author: Meir

customer_reviews.title: Not made for rough and tough users.
customer_reviews.text: So I have owned this for a few months now and when I used the Snugride 30 with it, it was fine and the best thing ever, but since I switched to the Snugride 35, the latch is catching often enough that it's starting to irritate me. Granted that I am using this thing pretty hard, if it makes it another 2... 3? months, I'll be surprised. Graco doesn't make replacement parts for this stroller btw, so if it goes down, this stroller is toast. That said, it's been doing it's best for all I've put it through.
customer_reviews.author: Megalyathon

customer_reviews.title: Must have for trips with infant
customer_reviews.text: For years I carried my young grandkids in their carseats in places because I didn't want to wake them if they were asleep in their carseat. A carseat plus a baby is HEAVY. This is the perfect option. Now, when I take my young grandchildren places (doctor's visits, etc) I can snap it in this and easily go from place to place without waking them or wearing myself out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We were on the fence about purchasing this item, and if you are too, JUST BUY IT! I can't believe we questioned it. It's so easy to use...I struggle more than I care to admit with 99% of the baby products we buy and this one was just so easy to use. Lightweight. Pops open, pops shut. Baby carrier just clicks in. You will not regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stroller for daily 3-4 mile walks/jogs for about a month now, and have been surprised by how much I like it. It easily folds/unfolds with only one hand, the handlebar is adjustable for a wide range of heights, it rolls smoothly, the seat clicks in and out securely and easily, and it's light and easy to manage. Really great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good when it worked for few trips and then it broke
customer_reviews.text: We hardly used this for may be 7-8 times and now handle which allow fold / unfold is broken , I had purchased this before my baby was born and due to Covid Scare I could not use it earlier. now when I finally wanted to use It’s broken. I feel buying from local target would have at least given me more protection against this kind of broken products .
customer_reviews.author: DayaS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a mom on the go!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect stroller for a mom on the go! It's compact, super easy to fold with one hand and simple to steer. Putting it together was fast and it has been a lifesaver for trips to grocery store, mall, etc. ! Wish I had this for my first child! I'm excited to use in airport on or next vacation. Only con is the basket underneath...It is a good size but difficult to get a diaper bag in once the car seat is attached. It is easier to put diaper bag in first.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Makes it so much easier
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is not going to be your go to for off roading, but quick trips to the mall or an impromptu walk through the park is written all over this. My child is 4 months and heavy. The carseat has always been a awkward hold for a 5'1" person like me. this is a quick pop up that has saved my back and hips! Only thing i would change is to have an added pouch for phone or dog bags! It does come with two cup holders and an under tray
customer_reviews.author: Mstarz

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight solution!
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight, Easy to fold (but safe and secure)! Storage isn't great, but I didn't purchase it for the storage. Car seat locks in firmly no issues. Handle bar folds down for a more compact storage solution. Exactly what I needed for a quick on the go car seat solution. I give it 5 out of 5 - I would purchase again knowing the quality of this item. I am using this as a suppliment to my regular stroller which is a beast and not easy for quick trips from the car to where ever I am going. This was a perfect solution for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Ayache

customer_reviews.title: Love it- easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! I have three strollers- this one, a regular single graco stroller and a graco Double stroller. I use this one the most. It’s so easy to fold and unfold, it’s lightweight and doesn’t take up a lot of room in the trunk. Has space to put diaper bag underneath and two cup holders. Definitely recommend if you have a graco click connect or classic connect car seat. I do wish it was a little less expensive because other brands sell the same thing cheaper, but I wanted graco since I have a graco car seat. I gave it 4 stars because of the price
customer_reviews.author: Karen Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! I got the graco jogger stroller for my baby shower and upon using it for the first time, I love it, but, it’s so big! It’s more of a stroller to use around the neighborhood, I wanted a smaller stroller to be able to easily put in my trunk, it’s the perfect size and so easy to fold up, not hard to pull out of my trunk. I take it everywhere with me, so much easier then flopping his car seat in a Cart, I just use the stroller. Definitely worth it! Although check prices, I got this stroller for $20 cheaper then what it’s listed at now.
customer_reviews.author: MariaP314

customer_reviews.title: Compact & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light weight! I can easily get this in & out of my car trunk (Pontiac g6). Maneuvers around very easily. Occasionally the locking mechanism gets stuck when trying to open, I think it’s just me not putting enough pressure on the handle because my husband never has this problem. Perfect little stroller for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it IMO
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I got this, it has made getting in & out of the car and short walks SO much easier. It’s def way too pricey (others sell for like 60 bucks) but I’m glad I have it. I read reviews about it getting stuck trying to fold but I haven’t had that problem yet (hopefully never will). Def put it on your registry so you don’t have to use the big stroller when baby is small.
customer_reviews.author: Vinecia Tanai

customer_reviews.title: Must buy, for every new parent.
customer_reviews.text: I seriously don’t know why I waited so long to buy this. I prefer it over any other stroller. It’s light, easy to fold and compact. Must have product for the first year while baby is still in car seat. No need to wake the baby while you transfer in and out of car. And you can’t beat the price for it. I only wish I had purchase two kids ago. I finally bought it for my 3rd and it is the best purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L.I

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: We planned a few vacations with our daughter while she was still brand new (2-3 months, please don't judge, this isn't our first rodeo). But dreaded having to carry that huge heavy stroller that came with her car seat. I found this solution online and let me just tell you, I use it more than the regular stroller! Super easy, light weight and compact! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: I spend too much money with amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Although I LOVE the ease of this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Although I LOVE the ease of this stroller, the storage compartment is almost impossible to get to with the car seat snapped in. I don't understand why they couldn't design this stroller frame to give more accessibility for storage. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Davis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use could be better
customer_reviews.text: Like the lightweight and easy to fold unfold feature. However there isn't much that fits in the cupholders unless you use throw away products (I always have my water bottle and it won't fit.) and there is a hole in the center of the bar where my phone could fit if it wasn't a hole. Total waste of space!
customer_reviews.author: just jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier and stroller
customer_reviews.text: We’ve owned multiple different brands and types of carriers (4 kids new set for each one... wife’s concern the plastic gets old). This has by far been be easiest to lose in the truck and the purpose built stroller is great for the carrier. We never much use the stroller once they’re out of the infant carrier so having a lighter stroller has been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Assembling this item was kind of on the difficult side for me. I had to use a hammer a few tome to get piceces together but I think it having such tight pieces will make it last longer. It’s good quality matieral, and rolls smoothly. Baby isn’t here yet but I already know I’m gonna love it. It’s compact and have a two in one stroller car seat will make things very easy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, Hate. But love more.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS. ONE OF OUR MOST USED BABY ITEMS. Folds to a great size. Main complaint is the unlock feature to fold it down didn’t work VERY frustrating. We found out we had to pull up on the levers on both sides and manually unlock which made things harder but was still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Impressive caddy! Light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I’m 4’11” and 9 months pregnant right now, if I say this is easy to open and maneuver, then it is! Researched a lot of car seat/caddy combos (buying seperate vs systems, diff brands that were compatible) and the Graco car seat we bought is as equally amazing as this caddy. We now own 4 graco seats and 3 graco stroller systems. Best prices best products.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: We are a very on the go family and this stroller makes it so easy to transport our infant car seat without waking a ...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is a must have for all moms! We are a very on the go family and this stroller makes it so easy to transport our infant car seat without waking a sleeping baby! It’s so small and lightweight. With one hand I grab the car seat out of the car and with the other I am able to grab the stroller from the truck and open it with one hand! The size makes this product perfect for doctors appointments or quick store runs. My other stroller would crowd the doctors office room and this one fits anywhere with ease. Totally worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Burk

customer_reviews.title: Nice stroller - but be gentle with it in the trunk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller to use with a graco carseat for the convenience of being light and foldable. It is easy to fold in one step (push button to side with thumb and pull big button with other fingers). Sometimes it can be a bit sticky and you might have to jiggle it but overall it is pretty good. One time I put in in the trunk and closed the trunk door on the wheel, which caused it to bend and eventually it fell off. So make sure you don't jam it in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F. Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t go this route again
customer_reviews.text: Started breaking down after a few months. Still works though just have to get rough with it to open/close it. Rolls around good and has little room for storage. Convenient to use with the car seat though. If you don’t have the car seat I would explore other options before going with this set up. There’s a lot better quality products out there
customer_reviews.author: Arie Snider

customer_reviews.title: Hate the kids love it I love it new Daddy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend in my newborn baby when newborn son and let me tell you she loved it because it's light it is very easy easy to push pull maneuver the baby enjoy it asleep swelling it is easy to put up in a car this is like two seconds just a folded down to fit in my trunk are folded down to put in the backseat The click connect this the best thing ever for Greco I really don't write reviews but this is amazing very amazing I know dad from
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: First I got the chair Graco, later I bought the rider Graco. Easy to fold. I would like it lighter but we will always want that. Good deal for the price. Best decision ever. Something important to tell you is that you can not pair your Graco chair together with the car accessory. You will have to pair your chair with the rider alone (not including the car accessory).
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert M.

customer_reviews.title: I wish this click and go stroller was more compatible with bigger carseats...
customer_reviews.text: I have the graco 4 in 1 carseat this product is good for traveling like airports and cruises,,,, that's is why I gave it 4 stars..... But for every day use too much,,, you have to latch the anchor of the carseat to the car than hook the seatbelt underneath the carseat.... When you want to use your click and go stroller you have to unlatch everything and the seat belt from underneath the carseat,,, Hook the back anchor to the click and go make sure the carseat is level right,,, with the click and go stroller.... I gave it a 4 and not a 5 because it is too much work for bigger carseats...
customer_reviews.author: shae

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this frame I wish I had this with my 2 boys super light weight easy to maneuver easy to fold great size my baby will be here this May and I can’t wait to use it very good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ylaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for airport travel
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is perfect if you need to travel with your newborn. It is lightweight and you can bring it to the door of the plane. It was definitely worth it! I would recommend it to any new parent that is traveling by plane and that has a click connect Graco infant car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this. I have the jogger stroller system but it’s a little to big for every day use. This stroller let’s me use the same car seat but now have a smaller that is light weight and something I can handle when by myself. You can fold down one handed.
customer_reviews.author: Davita Gebauer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Basket below doesnt fit our backpack diaperbag. And if we hang it from the handle, you risk tipping the stroller. Wish the cupholders were deeper and there was a place to but my phone. Still a good deal. Easy to collapse and pop back up, to maneuver, and to snap on and off the graco carseat carrier. I walk my little one in this everyday and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Great easy stroller but I have minor issues with it
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is pretty good, very easy to fold, very small and good if you have a small car. The car seat connects very easily to the stroller and it's great for in and out of the car trips. I gave it 4 stars because I think the car seat sits very low that you can't access the basket so easily - that is a big deal for me. The parent tray really bothers me as well, . A bottle of water doesn't fit in it or there is no spot for a phone, it's usless. I think the tray needs to be updated to actually be practical to the things most parents carry with them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Bad stroller
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product already had it replaced because of it not being sturdy, it eased replaced, now a wheel came off, its squeaking its not sturdy. Doesn't the company check their products before selling to public. Now i have to buy a completely different stroller, i do not want, god forbid anything to happen to my baby while being in a stroller that seems as if it's going to just fall apart
customer_reviews.author: Karen Marino

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is super convenient and easy to put together. It took my husband 10 minutes tops to get it assembled. It’s just easy to store in a car. The only complaint is that if you plan on doing a lot of outdoor walking I would invest in a jogger stroller. This is perfect for stores and short quick need.
customer_reviews.author: Raekay23

customer_reviews.title: Easy Use Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably at the top of my list of purchases I made as a new mother! My baby is 4 months old, and this has been a life saver for me! I cannot carry anything too heavy, and this car seat stroller is very easy to maneuver, light weight, and easy to use with my Graco car seat! It folds and fits perfectly into my vehicle, leaving space for anything else I might need in my trunk!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Must have for infants!!
customer_reviews.text: Best money spent for baby! This thing I'd awesome! Just snap the carseat in and go! It does catch sometimes trying to unfold or fold it up but it's easy to work out. My only issue is that the red line on the carseat that is supposed to be parallel to the ground is slightly off once snapped in.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love having this for our car seat
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love having this for our car seat. I bought a used Graco Click Connect car seat online and it works perfect with this. It is so easy to snap the car seat in and out yet is safe and secure. It is great to use when I run in to Walmart or Target or any other store. It folds with just one hand and is super light, I can pick it up with just one hand. I am very happy I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Adams

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: love love love. it is mini , and so fit for me . it is so convince and light. easier then travel system to set the car seat . easy to carry and take out . one of the best thing is my car is mini suv . once i put this in the truck . it only take half side and i save lots of space. this product is very good for new mom. i usually a lot because i alway by myself to take care of the child. don’t spent too much money to buy the travel system car seat and stroller . you will love this one .
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: You need this if you have a Graco Click-Connect carseat
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-have click connect stroller. It is very light, opens with one hand, stands when it is closed, and is easy to push around. You can only use it while your baby is in a rear-facing car seat, so there is no need to get an expensive alternative. This is a high quality stroller that is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoon

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is good enough for getting baby in/out of car for short ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller since I bought Graco car seat and car base. It turns out, I did not need to match w/ all Graco to fit car seat to stroller, but I did not know this. This stroller is good enough for getting baby in/out of car for short distance. I do want to say though, plastic handle part is cheap and clicks do not work all the time. We have different stroller for long distance purpose...
customer_reviews.author: 5Gemini

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller, super lightweight, easy to pull in and out of my truck (especially with my lift). Other than that it was wasy to assemble and pretty straightforward. (Didn't have to watch a youtube video later to rwmeber how to collapse it, just common sense with this stroller)
customer_reviews.author: h. minkler

customer_reviews.title: Truly love it! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Truly love this thing! It’s light, it’s easy to fold/unfold. It’s small, so you don’t have to mess with a big, unwieldy nightmare in a crowd or a quick errand. And it’s easy to get the car seat in/out. I’ve seen many other moms using it during the morning rush of the walking an older kiddo in/out of school, or just around the block.
customer_reviews.author: lisa garvin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday, My son (11 years old) basically put it together and was pretty simple. it's lightweight, portable and surprisingly sturdy. It looks sleek and works perfectly with out baby's car seat. You are able to take off the front set of wheels very easily to fit in tight spaces. I got it on sale, so it makes this deal even sweeter, I recommend this product to anyone ;looking for a simple stroller that is compact.
customer_reviews.author: Albert R.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: We got the car seat as a baby shower gift and I bought this a little after he was born because I was sick of carrying the car seat in stores. There's a big area to store the diaper bag under where the car seat clicks. Easy to click and detach the car seat the push handle is adjustable. It's a little finicky to collapse but we're are able to store it in the trunk of the car with out it taking up too much space
customer_reviews.author: mackenzie meacham

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I am able to get it in and out of my trunk and unfold and fold it with just one hand. My only complaint is that there isn’t a lot of storage, but with the stroller being so small and light, it’s to be understandable. Cup holders are small, not a good place for your phone.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller that we keep in the back of our car for when we're out and don't want to manually carry the car seat with us everywhere. Super lightweight and super easy to use! We also have a Graco jogger stroller, which is great for going on runs / walks with baby, but this stroller is a great additional stroller to have for vacations, going to the grocery store, walking around downtown, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Emma St.Aubin

customer_reviews.title: Fits Grace Snugride 30
customer_reviews.text: This fit our grace snugrude 30 perfectly. I love how easy it opens and folds out, simple to put together. I don’t feel likes it’s heavy, I pull it out of the trunk one handed all the time. I do feel it is sturdy and safe for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: NinnieUGA

customer_reviews.title: Small and compact but the fold is constantly getting stuck.
customer_reviews.text: The fold button is constantly getting stuck. I’ve learned to deal with it, but it would be nice if it just worked correctly. Other than that, it’s size and maneuvering are excellent. People are constantly telling me how compact it is, and I can definitely tell the difference between it and a large travel system. I would still recommend it if you are looking for something small just to get you through until baby is old enough to sit in an umbrella style stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter, who was struggling to lug around the new baby in a heavy car seat and about to have major surgery. She called me to say "this is a game changer! It's so much easier!" Fits her Graco car seat perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love how light weight this stroller is and it was perfect for what I was looking for. I travel a lot with my older son for sports and this stroller makes it easy to transport my newborn when he falls asleep. There is just enough storage at the bottom for a diaper bag. At the top of the stroller there isn’t room for a cell phone or sunglasses besides the two cup holders which was annoying but I bought a separate snap on storage and now it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: Sooo easy
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I wish there were more room for a diaper bag under the car seat click area it’s almost a useless space because it is so small and it is hard to get to when the car seat is in place other than that it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Laia Kurschner

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had the 3 wheel one that came w the car seat travel system but it was too big and bulky. This one is perfect for strolling around shopping or taking baby to restaurants (usually ones w an outdoor patio). Baby sots a bit low but overall this is super convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and perfect for small outings
customer_reviews.text: This has been really useful for shopping, going out to eat or on short walks. We use her travel system jogging stroller for park outings, though. Some reviews mention folding it can be tough, but with a little practice we have had no trouble. Easy to put together and fits well in even a tiny car trunk (Toyota Yaris iA).
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! It’s easy to use, was easy to assemble, fits nicely into the back of my car. I can whip it out or fold it up one handed. My car seat clicks right in place, and I like that I can put my keys and a water bottle in the spaces up top and a diaper bag below. One improvement would be to add a cell phone compartment, but that’s not a big deal. Overall it’s a great piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.author: holly hansen

customer_reviews.title: Worked with 2 different Graco carriers
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight. Easy to fold and unfold. Occasionally the lock will get stuck and it'll take a few times to unfold, but nothing that deserves less than 5/5 stars. Described as "can work with any Graco seat," and I am able to report that 2 of 2 seats I tried did indeed work even though the bases of the car seats did not work with each other.
customer_reviews.author: alohameg

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this sooner, and with my first born too! So much easier than a bulky travel system, this stroller pops out and is super user friendly. Take it anywhere, and there’s no need to move baby from the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I purchased this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this stroller! It has been easy for me to carry post c-section. First, I used it in the house in conjunction with my son's Graco carseat to wheel him around when I was in extreme pain. I am glad I can take it anywhere since it is very lightweight and small. The wheels have held up nicely. This is a great option until my son outgrows his carseat in which I plan to buy a jogging stroller. I highly recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Snug Ride 30!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stroller to fit my snug ride 30 car seat so that I don't have to physically move my baby from the car seat to the stroller everytime, and it fits perfectly! I love that it's not too big so it doesn't take up much space, I can put it in my trunk or between the seats. Also it's very light weight which is great. I get many compliments on it, mainly for it's not so bulky size. I'm very happy with this purchase, definitely recommend it if you're even thinking about buying it.
customer_reviews.author: AChavez

customer_reviews.title: It is easy and quick to put together
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is so convenient. It only takes up half of the trunk of my sedan. It is easy and quick to put together, super lightweight, and easy to use as it just snaps into place with a swift movement. I use it with my Graco Snugride Classic Connect 30. There are cupolders and nice storage below for smaller trips to the store. One of my favorite baby purchases. Keep in mind, it is less expensive so the materials are not as solid as a $400 stroller, but it's functional for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Dunker

customer_reviews.title: One hand fold is a lie!
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing the first two days. I had to have an emergency c-section for my baby and I am not supposed to lift heavy so that is why I decided to go with this product. The easy one fold button was the selling feature to me. Now that button does not work and instead I have to fold the item on the side. I am not happy with it anymore and its too late to return it because I actually need it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Must have for baby registry
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t recommend this product more!! It is so compact and light weight. It saves me from having to carry the heavy car seat. I take it everywhere, especially restaurants since it seems they don’t always have great solutions for car seats. I wouldn’t recommend on unpaved surfaces, I still use my jogging stroller for those areas.
customer_reviews.author: Trayrex18

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this! 💜
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time using this Graco product, The last time i purchased a similar item it was 6 years ago so i knew what i would be ordering and getting. I love the upgraded safety features, how easily it assembled, and that it arrived so fast! I would continue to order this product each child we have! It connects so easily to our Graco snugride Dlx 35 and i cannot wait to put it to the test with our family adventures!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleyy

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I already had the click connect carseat, but wanted a stroller that was light weight. This is perfect. It's easy to fold and easy to move around. It's also very easy to push with one hand if needed. I'm glad I bought this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Graco Click Connect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Portable, durable, and convenient. This was perfect in my Pediatrician's tiny exam rooms. The swivel wheels made it even better to maneuver. It took my 3rd baby for me to realize I should've bought this from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana O.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this product so much!!! We bought two of these so we each have one in our vehicles and we use them every single day! They are so easy to assemble and to fold/unfold. It's so much easier to use this than carry the heavy carseat around on my arm. The carseat snaps in so easily and they push and turn easily, as well. It's nice to be able to steer it with one arm while using the other for whatever is necessary! Great product and would recommend it to every parent out there!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse O'Grady

customer_reviews.title: Very Compact!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after trying to fit my jogging stroller in the back of my jeep. This takes up very little space and folds very easily! I use this for grocery store and other places where I want to keep him in his car seat!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rossow

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! This is so much easier and lightweight than a full stroller. Great for our daily walks and will be great when we start going out. Haven’t used it for shopping yet but the basket seems pretty roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn L Meade

product_meta.title: Graco SnugRider Elite Car Seat Carrier | Lightweight Frame Stroller | Travel Stroller Accepts any Graco Infant Car Seat, Black
product_meta.description:
Simply click in your favorite Graco infant car seat and go! The SnugRider Elite turns your favorite infant car seat into an ultra-portable travel solution & is the only car seat carrier engineered exclusively for Graco car seats. Compatible with all Graco Classic Connect and Click Connect infant car seats.

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: This Graco stroller turns your car seat into an ultra portable travel solution and is the only car seat carrier engineered exclusively for Graco seats ; Height adjustable handle for comfortable strolling
Ultra lightweight aluminum car seat stroller frame is the perfect infant car seat accessory, providing convenience on the go ; Meets Disney Size Requirements

Car seat travel cart works with all Graco infant car seats (including both Classic Connect and Click Connect seats).Care and Maintenance Never use bleach. To clean stroller frame, use only household soap and warm water
One hand, standing fold with automatic storage lock, means no bending necessary. Parent's tray with 2 deep cup holders for on-the-go convenience

Extra large storage basket with zippered pocket securely holds your travel essentials ; All wheel suspension for a smooth ride on any surface with single front swivel wheels for enhanced maneuverability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,227 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
